title: Removed from queue for failing to select champion
body: When I queue up for ranked it kicks me out saying I've failed to select champion when on my screen it's still the enemy team choosing. My internet isn't lagging.

replies.body:
Does this happen every time you queue up? Try testing it in customs, please.

What ISP are you with, and what OS do you use?

No, this is only the third time it's happened in the past two days. I imagine it only occurs in draft mode.

I'm with Telstra and I use an Acer desktop. I've been playing league on this desktop since season 1 so this is a new problem for me.

OS is operating system. I guess that could be confused for what computer you're using, but technically it means the software which boots up when your hard-drive (or SSD) is selected as the boot device. Basically, Windows, iOS or other.

Telstra is actually a pretty reliable ISP, considering they're the closest thing you could get to an affordable back-bone provider.

Try looking over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). If you need help with any of it, just ask and say which one you're having trouble with.

Best of luck.
